frameDefinitions: A Speaker makes a commitment to an Addressee to carry out some future action.
Words in the frame refer to any Document that has a legal status or conventional social significance.

An Initial_element is converted into a Final_element via a process of decay, fusion, or fission which changes the number or type of hadrons (protons or neutrons) in the nucleus of the atoms that make up the Element.  '5.5 percent of nucleii decay from tritium to He3 in a year .'
A condition that is set out in an Agreement imposes Requirements on a Party or parties, with respect to some Regulated_entity.
A Speaker either agrees to or refuses to engage in a Proposed_action, proposed by an Interlocutor. '' 'They agreed to express their outrage with editorials in today's paper.'
One phenomenon, the Predictive_phenomenon is an indication of the future or current (but still uncertain) existence of another phenomenon, the Future_phenomenon.
frameExamples: You <t>promised</t> me you'd come to my graduation.
They got their marriage <t>licence</t> from Canada.
5.5 percent of nucleii <t>decay</t> from tritium to He3 in a year .
Breach of contract occurs where one of the parties fails to perform any one of the contract <t>terms</t> .
They <t>agreed</t> to express their outrage with editorials in today's paper.
listRoleDefinitions: The Speaker is the person who commits him/herself to do something.  Speaker is usually the External Argument of predicative uses of the target or the Genitive modifier of a noun: <fex name='Speaker'>Jo</fex> made a <t>promise</t> to me. <fex name='Speaker'>Jo</fex> <t>promised</t> me she would cook dinner. <fex name='Speaker'>Jo's</fex> <t>promise</t> to cook dinner came to nothing.

The Speaker's commitment can be made to an Addressee.  With those words which allow this frame element to be expressed, Addressee usually occurs as a PP Complement headed by <ment>to</ment> or the (Indirect) Object of verbs: Kim made a <t>promise</t> <fex name='Addressee'>to me</fex>. Kim <t>promised</t> <fex name='Addressee'>me</fex> that everything would be okay.

An expression of the commitment made by the Speaker expresses the frame element Message.  Message is expressed as a finite or non-finite clausal Complement or an NP Object: I <t>swore</t> <fex name='Message'>that I would never make the same mistake again</fex>. The owner finally <t>consented</t> <fex name='Message'>to sell the business</fex>. They <t>threatened</t> <fex name='Message'>revenge</fex>.
Topic expressions are not very frequent in this frame. They can occur with noun targets. Jo made endless <t>promises</t> <fex name='Topic'>about working harder at school</fex>.

As with other frames in the Communication domain, the <t>Medium</t> of communication may be expressed. Medium is the physical entity or channel used to transmit the Message. Bob <t>threatened</t> the workers <fex name='Medium'>in Spanish</fex>.
The time period during which the <fen>Speaker</fen> makes the commitment.
The location in which the <fen>Speaker</fen> makes the commitment.
The holder of the document.
The authority that issues the document.
Obligation is the obligation that is imposed on the <fen>Bearer</fen> of the <fen>Document</fen>.
Right is the right of the <fen>Bearer</fen> of the <fen>Document</fen>  that is authorized by the <fen>Document</fen>.
Status is the state of the Bearer of the Document indicated by the Document.
Document is the piece of paper that has the legal status.
A substance definable in terms of the kind(s) of atoms that make it up.
The type of <fen>Element</fen> that results from the process.
The type of <fen>Element</fen> that begins the process.
The time at which the <fen>Element</fen> undergoes the transformation.
The location where the nuclear process occurs.
A mutual commitment to an obligation made by two or more parties.
A salient entity, an activity or behavior by the parties to the agreement to which a particular stipulation pertains.
The <fen>Requirements</fen> that a particular stipulation of the <fen>Agreement</fen> imposes on one or both of the parties.
An event or state of affairs that is desirable to some or all of the parties to the <fen>Agreement</fen> and which is conditional on the <fen>Requirements</fen> being met.
A party who demands that certain <fen>Requirements</fen> be met before they will enter into an <fen>Agreement</fen> or allow a <fen>Desired_state_of_affairs</fen> to be realized.
The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the person to whom a particular action has been proposed and who responds to the request or offer made.
This is the person who proposed the <fen>Proposed_action</fen>  to the <fen>Speaker</fen> and to whom the <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates  their response.
The <fen>Proposed_action</fen> is an action that the <fen>Speaker</fen> would perform if they were to accept or refuse the request or offer.
The time interval during which the <fen>Speaker</fen> makes their verbal response concerning the proposed action.
The location in which the <fen>Speaker</fen>  gives their verbal response to the proposed action.
<fen>Predictive_phenomenon</fen> provides evidence for the existence or the nature of the <fen>Outcome</fen> of <fen>Future_phenomenon</fen>.
<fen>Future_phenomenon</fen> is that phenomenon that is predicted to occur or have a particular quality.
The role <fen>Outcome</fen> identifies those expressions that indicate how the <fen>Future_phenomenon</fen> is expected to turn out based on the evidence of the <fen>Predictive_phenomenon</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the omen is occuring.
The location where something good or bad might occur.
listRoleExamples:
The chancellor <fex>yesterday</fex> promised to increase defence spending in real terms next
year.
The july framework has reaffirmed what was promised <fex>at Doha</fex>.
<fex>US consulate</fex> issued a Visa to Ms. Yang to travel to San Francisco.
They were all under subpoena <fex>to appear in court.</fex>
The couple just got their <fex>marriage</fex> certificate.
The police need a search <fex><t>warrant</t></fex> to enter his house.
The right to remove tenants ' fixtures may be given by the terms <fex>of the lease</fex>.
Many believed that the <fex>military</fex> terms of the armistice made the resumption of hostilities virtually impossible for Germany.
Each time you use the site, a condition of use is <fex>that you comply with the above terms</fex>.
<fex>Our</fex> political and military terms of peace will be designed to prevent a repetition of Germany's misdeeds
<fex>To achieve so much this year</fex> augurs well for the future.
This move presages <fex>a freeze on the granting of new concessions</fex>.
It all bodes <fex>well</fex> for the future.
The storm bodes ill for you <fex>here</fex> .

sourceCandidateSpans.text: more than half a million dollars
THE PHONE CALL CAME IN ON AUGUST 25
